page.title: 19 The School Curriculum
page.content: The school aims to develop the full potential of the pupils in all aspects;intellectual,phyical,social and aesthetic. The curriculum is designed to develop basic skills and build up knowledge,develop the capacity to think,foster moral,social and emotional development and provide a variety of stimulating experiences by bringing the world to the "school" and taking the "school" to the world. A variety of reading schemes are provided, to cater for the individual needs,to assist progress and consolidate attainment. Mathematical concepts are introduced by practical work and concrete experiences.Consolidation and practice in the use and application of number facts is given by mental and written work.
